original_title: Jaffna District MP Gajendrakumar Ponnambalam  who was Arrested in Colombo by Maruthankerni and Jeyapuram Police Is Released After being  Granted Rs 500,000 Surety Bail by Kilinochchi Magistrates Court
original_body_lines: Tamil National Peoples Front (TNPF) leader and MP Gajendrakumar Ponnambalam who was arrested over an incident in Jaffna between him and the police, was gran
The MP was arrested this morning (June 7) by the officers of Maruthankerni and Jayapuram Police stations.
He was produced before the court after recording a statement.
The Kilinochchi magistrate earlier imposed an overseas travel ban on the MP and ordered him to issue a statement to the Maruthankerni Police.
